name: BenQ DesignVue PD3225U
description: 32-inch 4K professional monitor with factory-calibrated accuracy. Features Thunderbolt 3 daisy-chaining, KVM switch, and M-book mode for Mac color matching.

reviews.review_text: Factory calibration is spot-on. Ready out of the box.
KVM switch between Mac and PC is super convenient.
Good monitor but not quite Apple Studio Display quality.
